nodes.bodyText: Preexisting, but this is wrong. when the sys propeerty is "false", we should not be enabled
What if sys property is false but CONTINUOUS_INTEGRATION is set? To me this is OR so it is correct as any of this enables the retrying.
sys property is "closer to invocation" and thus should override env variable presence
Oh... now I get your point. You mean that one should override the other, that makes sense. See: #6045
printing but to 'null' suggests the value is "null", not null
